ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Hearing loss caused by impaired transmission of signals from the external auditory canal or middle ear to the cochlea._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone._The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body._The transmission or conveying of something through a medium or passage, especially the transmission of heat or electricity or sound._The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Hearing loss caused by impaired transmission of signals from the external auditory canal or middle ear to the cochlea.
Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.

The result of an action.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Previous Extremely High Frequency Test Comparison
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question._Occurring prior to something else._The band of radio frequencies in the electromagnetic spectrum from 30 to 300 gigahertz._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Occurring prior to something else.
The band of radio frequencies in the electromagnetic spectrum from 30 to 300 gigahertz.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.
The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.
